AssociateDeviceWithPlacement.name: AssociateDeviceWithPlacement
AssociateDeviceWithPlacement.description: Grants permission to associate a device to a placement

ClaimDevicesByClaimCode.name: ClaimDevicesByClaimCode
ClaimDevicesByClaimCode.description: Grants permission to claim a batch of devices with a claim code

CreatePlacement.name: CreatePlacement
CreatePlacement.description: Grants permission to create a new placement in a project

CreateProject.name: CreateProject
CreateProject.description: Grants permission to create a new project

DeletePlacement.name: DeletePlacement
DeletePlacement.description: Grants permission to delete a placement from a project

DeleteProject.name: DeleteProject
DeleteProject.description: Grants permission to delete a project

DescribeDevice.name: DescribeDevice
DescribeDevice.description: Grants permission to describe a device

DescribePlacement.name: DescribePlacement
DescribePlacement.description: Grants permission to describe a placement

DescribeProject.name: DescribeProject
DescribeProject.description: Grants permission to describe a project

DisassociateDeviceFromPlacement.name: DisassociateDeviceFromPlacement
DisassociateDeviceFromPlacement.description: Grants permission to disassociate a device from a placement

FinalizeDeviceClaim.name: FinalizeDeviceClaim
FinalizeDeviceClaim.description: Grants permission to finalize a device claim

GetDeviceMethods.name: GetDeviceMethods
GetDeviceMethods.description: Grants permission to get available methods of a device

GetDevicesInPlacement.name: GetDevicesInPlacement
GetDevicesInPlacement.description: Grants permission to get devices associated to a placement

InitiateDeviceClaim.name: InitiateDeviceClaim
InitiateDeviceClaim.description: Grants permission to initialize a device claim

InvokeDeviceMethod.name: InvokeDeviceMethod
InvokeDeviceMethod.description: Grants permission to invoke a device method

ListDeviceEvents.name: ListDeviceEvents
ListDeviceEvents.description: Grants permission to list past events published by a device

ListDevices.name: ListDevices
ListDevices.description: Grants permission to list all devices

ListPlacements.name: ListPlacements
ListPlacements.description: Grants permission to list placements in a project

ListProjects.name: ListProjects
ListProjects.description: Grants permission to list all projects

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to lists the tags for a resource

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or modify the tags of a resource

UnclaimDevice.name: UnclaimDevice
UnclaimDevice.description: Grants permission to unclaim a device

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove the given tags (metadata) from a resource

UpdateDeviceState.name: UpdateDeviceState
UpdateDeviceState.description: Grants permission to update device state

UpdatePlacement.name: UpdatePlacement
UpdatePlacement.description: Grants permission to update a placement
